title: AllPaths Enriched Paths Schema
description: Schema for paths_enriched.json - paths with git metadata added

paths.description: Array of all enumerated paths with git metadata

id.description: 8-character hex hash uniquely identifying this path (based on route and content)

route.description: Ordered list of passage names traversed in this path

content.description: Map from passage name to passage text content

git_metadata.description: Git version control metadata for this path

files.description: List of source .twee files containing passages in this path

commit_date.description: Most recent commit date across all files in this path (ISO 8601 format)

created_date.description: Date when path became complete (most recent passage creation date, ISO 8601 format)

passage_to_file.description: Mapping from passage names to their source .twee file paths

total_passages.description: Total number of unique passages in the story graph

avg_path_length.description: Average number of passages per path
